thread.title: Kiev full of cathedrals, close enough for trip to Chernobyl
thread.title_full: Kiev full of cathedrals, close enough for trip to Chernobyl - San Francisco Chronicle

author: By Denise Vouri
title: Kiev full of cathedrals, close enough for trip to Chernobyl
text:

Denise Vouri of Concord in Chernobyl in front of former nuclear...
Why I went: I wanted to see a part of Eastern Europe, but did not want to go to Russia. I spent time in Kiev, including taking a day trip out to Chernobyl (quite safe and very interesting) and then flew to Odessa, for some time along the sea.
